verses.name: Zechariah 14:5
verses.text: And ye shall flee to the valley of the mountains; for the valley of the mountains shall reach unto Azal: yea, ye shall flee, like as ye fled from before the earthquake in the days of Uzziah king of Judah: and the Lord my God shall come, and all the saints with thee.

verses.name: Zechariah 14:6
verses.text: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the light shall not be clear, nor dark:
